case.title: Drinks this week - 34 (Greenwich Village)
case.text:
Hello,
I would love to meet someone smart, fun and attractive for a drink during the week and if there is the right chemistry, I am definitely open to a LTR.
I work for a tech startup and live in the Village. I have my MBA from NYU and I speak French fluently.
If you are interested, please tell me more about yourself and maybe we can meet for a drink. Your picture gets mine.
Take care
